name: Home Beyond Walls - Summer Fun at Scarborough Museum
description:
If walls could speak, what stories would they tell? This summer, join Scarborough Museum for fun and engaging activations within and beyond the museum's buildings and grounds. Engage in joyful placemaking with a variety of hands-on, minds on activities.

Stay tuned for additional details on specific workshops and activities all summer long!

name: Community Environment Day at Charles H. Best Junior Middle School

location.name: Charles H. Best Junior Middle School

description:
Join Councillor Pasternak (Ward 6) and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. 

Pick up free bagged compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each â€“ cash, debit and credit accepted).

name: Fitness Classes in St. James Park
description: Including NIA Dance, Yoga and Pilates and Boot Camp. All classes are subject to cancellation due to poor weather conditions.
